name: Say My Name
content: Say my name say my name
呼唤我名 呼唤我名
If you love me let me hear you
如果你爱我 就让我听到你
Say my name say my name
呼唤我名 呼唤我名
I am dying to believe you
我热切渴望你能相信我
I feel alone in your arms
在你的怀抱我却只觉孤独
I feel you breaking my heart
